New Records: Jarren Duran is chasing Boston Red Sox history with 75 extra-base hits as a leadoff hitter in 2024, close behind the record set by Nomar Garciaparra in 1997 with 85 extra-base hits
Key Match Events: The Boston Red Sox defeated the Detroit Tigers 7-5 in an extra-innings game on August 30, 2024
Post-Match Reflections: Jarren Duran's performance and the Red Sox's ongoing push for the wild card spot were highlighted after their victory against the Tigers
